title: You will love the luxury updates throughout the unit
description: You will love the luxury updates throughout the “penthouse” floor of this boutique Bella Vista condo walkable to Washington Square, parks, and South Street vibe. This one-bedroom condo encompasses the entire top floor of the building, and boasts a modern, open-concept airy feel while having tons of storage space and privacy! The newly renovated gourmet kitchen will be the centerpiece of your living area with plenty of space to entertain. Whether you hang out in the dining area, on the living room couch, or pull up a stool to the kitchen island and watch the chef prepare a 4-course meal using the gourmet stove and new granite countertops, there is no shortage of space to relax. Storage is never a problem in this home with several walk-in closets, a kitchen pantry, and a laundry room which also doubles as a large storage closet. If that isn’t enough, you always have access to the large basement for common shared storage. Down the hall in your bedroom, you can enjoy a cup of coffee and face the morning sun when you walk out of the large sliding glass doors to your personal Juliet balcony overlooking the courtyard below. This large bedroom has not one, but two spacious closets and plenty of extra room for a sitting area as well. This layout is perfect for privacy as the bedroom is down the hall away from the main entertainment area. Let’s not overlook the beautiful bathroom which also has new granite counter tops, a dual-flush toilet, large shower with rain-maker shower head, tile floors and plenty of light wood cabinets for storage. Don’t miss out on the luxury mirror with two different touch lighting sensors and a heat defrosting system that magically dissolves steam from the shower! Low condo fees covers all of your water bills and all common areas including the roof, making this an affordable, smart investment for all levels of buyers. The recent renovations of the common areas such as the wide hardwood stairway, freshly painted walls, and hallway lighting show that this is truly maintenance-free living! Located near the Rally Coffee Bistro, Nomad Pizza, and Hale and True Cider House, this peaceful block is walkable to the Italian Market, Independence Hall and many museums. Parking is plentiful on these side streets in this part of the city, and once you park, you can walk everywhere! Nothing beats the “king of the world” feeling of living on the top floor!

title: an urban space that combines the old with the new
description:
PROMOTION: MUST MOVE IN BY 4/30/22, TWO months free on a 13-month lease. Those two months will be first and last. Lofts 640 offers you the "most bang for your buck" in Philadelphia! Included with your monthly rental price is extended cable TV service, fitness center, indoor/heated pool and hot tub with attached outdoor roof deck, yoga/fitness studio, cyber lounge, 24/7 front desk attendant, and more!! Walk off the busy street into 640 North Broad and enter an urban space that combines the old with the new. Feel the past mix with a refreshing dose of hip, understated sophistication. The original character of the building is not lost but enhanced by modern accents and furnishings. A thriving community dwells within our walls -- a state-of-the-art fitness center, cyber cafe, and yoga studio serve to nurture body, mind, and spirit. Setting the night sky aglow, our glass-domed pool house is the perfect place to unwind. Go for a swim in the warm salt water, relax your muscles in the Jacuzzi, or meet and socialize on the roof deck lounge. Enter the lobby, your public space. Experience orange as it bursts in the artwork and pours from geometric ceiling lights that warm the mocha-colored floors. Accented with a healthy dose of pure white and stainless steel, contrast brings together the energizing elements of your entrance. A thriving community dwells within our walls -- a state-of-the-art fitness center, cyber cafe, and yoga studio serve to nurture body, mind, and spirit. Setting the night sky aglow, our glass-domed pool house is the perfect place to unwind. Go for a swim in the warm salt water, relax your muscles in the Jacuzzi, or meet and socialize on the roof deck lounge. Lofts 640 is just six (6) blocks north of City Hall on Broad Street. title: This 2 bed, 2 bath home in the heart of Queen Village
description:
This 2 bed, 2 bath home in the heart of Queen Village has the added bonus of being in the Meredith Elementary School catchment and a stone’s-throw away from the iconic Philadelphia Italian Market. In this rowhome, you will have plenty of living space, a finished basement, skylights, exposed brick, and your own private roof deck with unobstructed city views - ideal for reading, hosting family and friends, or just a quiet evening in. Enter through a lovely vestibule where you will find the living room featuring hardwood floors on the left accompanied by a coat closet and a utility closet large enough to hold bikes and strollers in the vestibule. Off the living room enter the updated eat-in kitchen with stainless steel appliances and quartz countertops. The dining area is enhanced with a large skylight, pantry, and exposed brick. A traditional staircase leads to 2 large bedrooms on the second and third levels. The second floor is home to the first bedroom which includes a built-in closet and laundry closet with washer and dryer. This floor also has a newly renovated bathroom with a tub/shower combo, rain shower head, automatic humidity sensor, a vessel sink, person in room night light and open shelving. The third floor has a large master bedroom and en-suite full bathroom with tub/shower combo and linen closet. Spacious roof deck with room to grill and grow a container garden. This home is completed with a finished basement with good ceiling height where you will find an area perfect for a den, office, entertainment or workout room with extra storage and a utility closet. Each room is outfitted with custom window shades for plenty of natural light and privacy or blackout shade for afternoon naps, wired for ethernet and enhanced with the home’s smart thermostat, video doorbell, smart deadbolt, and smart alarm system. This home is conveniently located near Whole Foods, Acme, Headhouse Square, Penns Landing, Italian Market, Optimal and Sweat Fitness, multiple yoga studios, and all the restaurants and cafes Queen Village has to offer. For our first responders and future first responders, it is walkable distance to Pennsylvania Hospital and Thomas Jefferson University Hospital. Easy access to Columbus Blvd., Market St., I-95, I-676, The Ben Franklin Bridge, subways, and less than two blocks from bus routes in any direction make this a great home for the best of city living. Walkable to many playgrounds, preschools and kid-friendly amenities. 360 virtual and in person tours are available."

title: This trinity-style home is cute as a button.
description:
Welcome to an original "tiny house". This trinity-style home is cute as a button. Located on a quaint quiet street in the Washington Square neighborhood, this 2 bedroom 1 bathroom home has character and charm. When you enter the home you are greeted by a living space that has windows on both sides, a working gas fireplace, access to the private patio, and a coat closet. Follow the spiral stairs down a level to the kitchen. This kitchen has all the necessary appliances including a washer & dryer in the closet next to the fridge. There is a small space for a bistro table and plenty of cabinets for storage. The spiral stairs up from the living room take you to the 2nd floor which houses the first of two bedrooms, with windows, 2 closets, and the home's full bathroom with a shower/tub combo, and a hall linen closet. Follow the stairs up one more level to the main bedroom. This encompasses the full floor. Windows on both sides let in lots of natural light, the ceiling fan helps with circulating the central heat and air, there are two closets on this floor and plenty of room for your bed, dresser, and nightstands. The patio outside allows for a grill, a small table and chairs, and your green thumb if you have one. The alley next to the home is gated and locked. It allows access to the street for your bike or to take out your garbage without going through the home. This location is a walker and rider paradise. A whole home to yourself. Come visit!

title: a historic gem located in the heart of Northern Liberties!
description:
Welcome HOME to 117 Fairmount Ave -- a historic gem located in the heart of Northern Liberties! Enter through the vestibule into a sunny and spacious living area equipped with oversized windows and a working fireplace, followed by the large dining area, a convenient half bath, and the kitchen - featuring stainless steel appliances, striking backsplash, eat-in peninsula, and plenty of cabinet and counter space. Just off the kitchen is the secluded back patio - perfect for gardening, grilling, entertaining, or kicking back to relax. The second floor is home to the primary bedroom, a large bathroom with claw foot tub and separate stall shower, and the second bedroom which boasts a built-in wet vanity and plenty of closet space. The third floor consists of the third bedroom which gets plenty of natural light, and a half flight of stairs takes you to the lofted fourth bedroom with vaulted ceilings and large windows allowing for fabulous views of the waterfront and Ben Franklin Bridge. Throughout the home, you'll enjoy ample storage space, original decorative arched windows, high ceilings, original hard wood flooring, clean basement with laundry, and loads of historic charm. Last but certainly not least, THE LOCATION is amazing -- a stone's throw from all that NoLibs has to offer; situated within close walking distance to local favorites and shopping/dining/nightlife on 2nd Street; easy commute to Old City, Fishtown, Center City, and beyond; close to grocery stores, convenience stores, highways, hospitals, parks, playgrounds, public transportation, and much much more! BONUS PERKS: Landlords arrange for a monthly house cleaning service at no cost to the tenant!! The block has restricted parking, so if you get a PPA permit you can park in front of the house at almost any time!! Schedule your today -- you need to see this one in person!

title: Beautiful 2 Bedroom 2 Bathroom Apartment Home, City View, Gym, Sauna
description:
The home at 1902 is a 1,185 square foot Da Vinci two bedroom two bathroom apartment home in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! This home on the 19th floor has windows that face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a city view. The beautiful kitchen and bathrooms are definitely a must see! There is also abundant closet space for plenty of storage. Experience the convenience of having a combination washer and dryer inside your new home! Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores and restaurants! Target, Giant, Trader Joe's, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, and Di Bruno Bros. are grocery stores within walking distance! Shop at the retail stores of Rittenhouse Row such as Barnes & Noble, Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, Shakespeare & Co., Paper Source, L'Occitane, Boyds, Banana Republic Factory, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Devon Seafood Grill, a.bar, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, Via Locusta, The Love, Marathon Grill, Gran Caffe L'Aquila, and Alice Pizza. Sip a delicious coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Elixr, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in a beautiful French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Stroll across the park and then buy a loaf of artisanal bread from Metropolitan Bakery.

title: Chic, Industrial Style Living!
description: This two-story corner property is nothing short of amazing. From the exposed brick walls and beams, custom stairs and railing, glass pendant lights and built-in shelving to the repurposed carriage doors, it's apparent that attention to detail was the most important aspect when designing this rental. Upon entering this modern home, you will immediately notice the original character and industrial flare, providing a loft-like atmosphere with its vast, open floor plan and sun-soaked living space. Additionally, there is a coat closet near the entrance and a convenient half-bath off the living space. The grand kitchen has all stainless steel appliances, metallic tile backsplash, granite countertops and plenty of cabinet space thanks to the built-in shelving along the side wall. Did we mention this also has a breakfast bar area? Heading up the gorgeous custom staircase you'll find two large bedrooms on the second floor, that each have their own private full bath with natural light, modern fixtures, tiled showers and floors. The industrial theme continues upstairs with the painted brick walls, exposed ductwork, pipe railings and wall detail. There is a laundry/office nook in the hall between the two bedrooms, and walk-through wardrobe closets on the way to the front bedroom. The location is ideal as well. Situated only a block of Frankford Ave., around the corner from Palmer Park, and close to public transportation and all the dining and entertainment you will need! Do not wait! This one-of-a-kind rental will not last long. Schedule your showing today!

title: A)- unique twin in Bustleton to 1825 Murray look no further the BBQ gr
description:
If you have been waiting for the perfect opportunity to add another property to your portfolio or personalize ... Say hello . As soon as you arrive you will notice the green front lawn and unique façade with front porch - a limited feature for this neighborhood that isn't offered on the market often.
Down the long driveway with plenty of parking space leads you to the detached brick garage to keep your car out of the snow in the winter and  and gardening tools in the summer when you are enjoying the spacious back yard.
As you enter onto the original hardwood flooring that runs straight through the dining room, you'll feel the coziness of the brick fireplace and banister along the wood staircase.
Single line kitchen in the rear with wood cabinets and stainless steel appliances. Upstairs are three sundrenched bedrooms with ample closet space and full center hall 3 piece bathroom. Basement has ample storage space and great potential for creating a bonus area for hobbies or exercise equipment.
The home does need some work but is priced as such and as the best deal in the neighborhood it won't be around long. Schedule your tour today.

description: duplex apartment is located in Rockledge, PA in the prestigious Abington School District. Rockledge is a quiet neighborhood located near shopping, restaurants, parks, playground, public transportation, Jeanes Hospital, Einstein Medical Center Elkins Park, and Fox Chase Cancer Center. The apartment has two bedrooms, living room, dining room, kitchen and one full bathroom. Washer, dryer and storage area are located in the basement using an outside entrance. The apartment includes a nice yard, driveway with off street parking, and a detached single car garage in the back of the property. The apartment has been recently carpeted on the second floor and the entire place has been painted. The apartment is available for immediate occupancy. if tenant mows the lawn and removes the snow. title: Available Early April: Expansive Studio w. FREE Laundry - NO LIBS
description:
Available early April:
Welcome to 109 W Wildey St #204 at the Schoolhouse Lofts! The Schoolhouse Lofts are a community of modern-industrial artist lofts inside the historic Daniel Boone School located at the cross-section of Fishtown and Northern Liberties area of Philadelphia. This beautiful, late gothic revival building was classically known as the Philadelphia school for the rebellious. This building brings a unique mix of old and new with trendy design elements like minimalistic lighting fixtures, exposed beams, original brick work, and fantastically intricate original details. This leading boutique building offers modern conveniences for modern living. The public spaces such as the elevator, mailroom, and multiple laundry rooms are custom engineered to minimize stress and maximize well-being. Unit #204 is a lovely studio apartment on the second floor. You enter the unit into into a hallway with a closet for additional storage. The spacious living area is L-shaped and offers hardwood floors and large windows along one wall for great natural light. There is tons of space for a bedroom and living room set up. The stunning kitchen features bar seating available at the counter, tile backsplash cabinetry above and below, an oven with electric cooktop, microwave, dishwasher, and refrigerator. There is an pantry area behind the kitchen for more storage options. Your full bathroom boasts sleek tiling, a shower/tub combo, and a vanity. All units have Central A/C! FREE laundry in laundry rooms located on the 1st, 2nd, and Penthouse floors of the building. Schedule a showing today!

Very spacious 2 bedroom, 2 bath loft apartment with high ceilings, large windows, and a great view on the 8th floor of the Lofts 640 building.  Unit includes washer/drier, central air conditioning, large walk-in closet, and plenty of kitchen counter space.
The Lofts 640 building has indoor garage parking, indoor pool and jacuzzi, full fitness center with Free Classes, cyber lounge, yoga studio, and all units cable-ready.  This is also a gated building with a 24/7 front desk.
There is an Aldi grocery store, CVS, plenty of restaurants, Broad Street Line subway access, and a gym all within a 5 minute walk of the building.  Also an easy 15 minute walk into Chinatown/Center City.
The apartment will be available June 1st, 2022.  Rent will be $2,500 monthly.  Signing up for a 13 month lease will get you 2 months free.

title: On site washer and dryer, Beautiful courtyards, Elevator building
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

title: This 2 bed, 2 bath home in the heart of Queen Village
description:
This 2 bed, 2 bath home in the heart of Queen Village has the added bonus of being in the Meredith Elementary School catchment and a stone’s-throw away from the iconic Philadelphia Italian Market. In this rowhome, you will have plenty of living space, a finished basement, skylights, exposed brick, and your own private roof deck with unobstructed city views - ideal for reading, hosting family and friends, or just a quiet evening in. Enter through a lovely vestibule where you will find the living room featuring hardwood floors on the left accompanied by a coat closet and a utility closet large enough to hold bikes and strollers in the vestibule. Off the living room enter the updated eat-in kitchen with stainless steel appliances and quartz countertops. The dining area is enhanced with a large skylight, pantry, and exposed brick. A traditional staircase leads to 2 large bedrooms on the second and third levels. The second floor is home to the first bedroom which includes a built-in closet and laundry closet with washer and dryer. This floor also has a newly renovated bathroom with a tub/shower combo, rain shower head, automatic humidity sensor, a vessel sink, person in room night light and open shelving. The third floor has a large master bedroom and en-suite full bathroom with tub/shower combo and linen closet. Spacious roof deck with room to grill and grow a container garden. This home is completed with a finished basement with good ceiling height where you will find an area perfect for a den, office, entertainment or workout room with extra storage and a utility closet. Each room is outfitted with custom window shades for plenty of natural light and privacy or blackout shade for afternoon naps, wired for ethernet and enhanced with the home’s smart thermostat, video doorbell, smart deadbolt, and smart alarm system. This home is conveniently located near Whole Foods, Acme, Headhouse Square, Penns Landing, Italian Market, Optimal and Sweat Fitness, multiple yoga studios, and all the restaurants and cafes Queen Village has to offer. For our first responders and future first responders, it is walkable distance to Pennsylvania Hospital and Thomas Jefferson University Hospital. Easy access to Columbus Blvd., Market St., I-95, I-676, The Ben Franklin Bridge, subways, and less than two blocks from bus routes in any direction make this a great home for the best of city living. Walkable to many playgrounds, preschools and kid-friendly amenities. 360 virtual and in person tours are available."

title: This trinity-style home is cute as a button.
description:
Welcome to an original "tiny house". This trinity-style home is cute as a button. Located on a quaint quiet street in the Washington Square neighborhood, this 2 bedroom 1 bathroom home has character and charm. When you enter the home you are greeted by a living space that has windows on both sides, a working gas fireplace, access to the private patio, and a coat closet. Follow the spiral stairs down a level to the kitchen. This kitchen has all the necessary appliances including a washer & dryer in the closet next to the fridge. There is a small space for a bistro table and plenty of cabinets for storage. The spiral stairs up from the living room take you to the 2nd floor which houses the first of two bedrooms, with windows, 2 closets, and the home's full bathroom with a shower/tub combo, and a hall linen closet. Follow the stairs up one more level to the main bedroom. This encompasses the full floor. Windows on both sides let in lots of natural light, the ceiling fan helps with circulating the central heat and air, there are two closets on this floor and plenty of room for your bed, dresser, and nightstands. The patio outside allows for a grill, a small table and chairs, and your green thumb if you have one. The alley next to the home is gated and locked. It allows access to the street for your bike or to take out your garbage without going through the home. This location is a walker and rider paradise. A whole home to yourself. Come visit!
